whatIs.title: What is Chromatic Analysis?
whatIs.description: ChromaticBot is an innovative application that transforms your music into a visual experience.
whatIs.details: We analyze the cover art of your most listened albums on Spotify, extracting color palettes and sorting them by different chromatic criteria to create unique visualizations.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.step1: Sign in with your Spotify account securely using OAuth2.
howItWorks.step2: Select the time period (1 month, 6 months, or all time) and the number of songs to analyze.
howItWorks.step3: Choose the sorting mode: by hue (rainbow), saturation (vibrant to gray), or brightness (light to dark).
howItWorks.step4: Our backend analyzes the covers using ColorThief, extracting up to 6 dominant colors per album.
howItWorks.step5: Generate a shareable poster locally in your browser to share on social media.

sorting.title: Smart Sorting
sorting.description: Sort your albums by hue, saturation, or brightness to discover chromatic patterns in your music.

poster.title: Shareable Posters
poster.description: Generate Receiptify-style images to share your chromatic palette on Instagram, Twitter, and more.

timeRange.title: Multiple Time Periods
timeRange.description: Analyze your music taste from the last month, 6 months, or all time.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Posters are generated locally in your browser. Your data is never stored on external servers.
